Group (2023-present):
FANTASY BOYS

Introduction

Kaedan is a member and the maknae of the boy group FANTASY BOYS under PocketDol Studios.

On February 20, 2023, he was introduced as a contestant on MBC's boy group survival show Fantasy Boys. During the show's finale, he secured the 12th position overall, earning him a spot as a member of Fantsay Boys.

The group debuted with the mini album "New Tomorrow" on September 21, 2023.
